ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] Sony sucks!
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I had to resubscribe at a higher price to get my account back but I got it back. I haven t logged in to see my characters yet though. I was still a bit
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I had to resubscribe at a higher price to get my account back but I got it back. I haven't logged in to see my characters yet though. I was still a bit irritated when I finally got it fixed.
Sony's customer service is really lacking these days. I mean, it wasn't always the best but it has really deteriorated.
luv,
-Su

======= At 2005-04-27, 04:45:00 you wrote: =======

>It worries me now as well. I havent played EQ since May of last
>year, and was hoping to return next month if all goes well. I am cer
>worried about my two accounts..which havent been paid for in quite
>awhile...I hope they are still all good and such. I put alot of
>time, effort, sweat, and tears into them and wou;d hate to loose
>them..
>
>Sigh..I guess time will tell...
>
>As always...Greg
>
>
>
>
>
>
>--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Su <suceress@d...> wrote:
>> Yeah. I'm going to talk to them when their CS opens today. I had a
>problem with my mother's account and them saying she didn't have the
>new expansion registered. I had to email them and complain. They
>took care of it fairly quickly. Considering they might lose 4
>accounts from me, they better do something when I contact them.
>> luv,
>> -Su
>>
>>
>> ======= At 2005-04-25, 22:46:00 you wrote: =======
>>
>> >If they still owe you time or $$$ then contact them and sort it
>out. Don't take a disabled acc. as an answer!
>> > ----- Original Message -----
>> > From: Su
>> > To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>> > Sent: Monday, April 25, 2005 10:54 PM
>> > Subject: [EverQuest] Sony sucks!
>> >
>> >
>> > I may be through with EQ now. I went to login to check my email
>and apparently for no reason my account was shut off. I have no idea
>why. Well, I have an idea and it might be the same fuck up as with
>my brother's account previously. So, I have to decide whether or not
>I want to bother renewing because they will probably charge me a
>higher price. I had a 3 year subscription dammit. It just pisses me
>off that they pulled this with me. I'm thinking of writing them an
>angry letter of complaint. I should wait til I'm less angry though.
>> > ARG. Just ARG!!!
>> > luv,
>> > -Su
>> >
>>
>>
>>
>>
